Game: Wonder Pets!- Save the Animals! WONDER PETS TO THE RESCUE! Animals are in trouble everywhere - a baby panda in China, a Bengal tiger in India, and a chimpanzee in outer space! Linny, Ming-Ming and Tuck need your help to bring everyone home safely. Features • Dress the Wonder Pets in different costumes!• Build the Flyboat using the stylus• Interactive Activities Include: Tapping, Blowing, Speaking and Dragging <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/51c047e1-9d89-43e6-9946-c869e3fc15d1.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/e194b493-9890-4a05-a6c9-b3c8a85da46c.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/f5ca5bc1-878c-4160-a926-69923ff9e91b.png
